title: Unspecified error occurred
body: Since 2015, every time I try to even open the client, it tells me 'unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information'. There have been sometimes (the rare occasion) where I could login and actually start to load a game; however it crashes in the summoning screen and then when I try to reconnect it doesn't let me. I tried logging off and on again but then it tells me the same thing 'unspecified bla bla bla'. Is it just me or is this happening to everyone in the OCE server; please help!

replies.body:
When does "unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information" appear? On the patcher, client or in-game?

What OS are you using, and who's your ISP?
